card.name: "The Lady of Otaria"
card.text: You may tap three untapped Dwarves you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.At the beginning of each end step, if a land you controlled was put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put any number of Dwarf cards from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: "The Six-Fingered Man"
card.text: FlashWhen "The Six-Fingered Man" dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each nontoken creature that died under your control this turn.

card.name: Ayesha Tanaka, Armorer
card.text: Whenever Ayesha Tanaka, Armorer attacks, look at the top four cards of your library. You may put any number of artifact cards with mana value less than or equal to Ayesha's power from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.Ayesha can't be blocked as long as defending player controls three or more artifacts.

card.text: Whenever Ayesha Tanaka, Armorer attacks, look at the top four cards of your library. card.text: Bad River enters the battlefield tapped.{T}, Sacrifice Bad River: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.text: The first spell you cast each turn has cascade. (When you cast your first spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Mana Cannons
